name: Chemical Data Sharing Forum
goal: ChemDSF is a not-for-profit organization regrouping actors from the chemical supply chain. Our aim is to create a platform where chemical data can be exchanged easily and quickly between companies and other stakeholders in an ever increasingly complex web of data sharing agreements, letters of access, consortium agreements, and other similar agreements. ChemDSF aims to facilitate the chemical data sharing among the private sector, academic institution, Agency, authority or regulator which need access to precise hazard data on a particular chemical or mixture, in a clear and well-ordered repository, and in a relevant language where possible.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
